Secret service spooks are so inventive! There are some captivating details relating highly suspicious Milocevic's death in Hague. Perhaps killers employed some sophisticated means to kill the famous prisoner. You see with 2 weeks left before the death they planted some new lamps in the cell room where he stayed. And the man I know working in the prison asserts they were painted with some strange paint or substance. The electrician who planted lamps in the room was not the staffer. And when my friend asked him about the strange paint he got very angry and joked kind of 'with your lips sealed you'll live longer'. Soon after M. died those lamps were hurriedly taken out.
Nothing like a good conspiracy theorey to keep us amused:)

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  They killed him by lamps!
